properties.areaDesc: San Bernardino and Riverside County Valleys-The Inland Empire
properties.headline: Freeze Warning issued February 4 at 5:00AM PST until February 5 at 9:00AM PST by NWS San Diego CA
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Freeze Warning this morning, sub-freezing
temperatures as low as 30. For the Freeze Warning tonight, sub-
freezing temperatures as low as 25 expected. For the Wind
Advisory, north winds 15 to 25 mph with gusts to 40 mph.

* WHERE...San Bernardino and Riverside County Valleys-The Inland
Empire.

* WHEN...For the Freeze Warning this morning, until 9 AM PST this
morning. For the Freeze Warning tonight, from 10 PM this
evening to 9 AM PST Wednesday. For the Wind Advisory, until 9 AM
PST Wednesday.

* IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree
limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive
vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
properties.instruction:
Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high
profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent
freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should
be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have
in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above-
ground pipes to protect them from freezing

NWSheadline: FREEZE WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM PST THIS MORNING... ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM PST WEDNESDAY... ...FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 9 AM PST WEDNESDAY
